lru_cache package

Submodules

lru_cache.lru_cache module

Module contents

class lru_cache.LRUCache(max_len)[source]

Bases: object

This is an LRU cache implementation with a fixed capacity.

add(key, value)[source]

Add a key-value pair to the cache. If the key already exists, it will overwrite the least recently used value. :param key: :param value: :return:

clear()[source]

Clear the cache. :return: None

delete(key)[source]

Delete a key from the cache. :param key: the key to delete :return: None

get(key)[source]

Get the value of a key. If the key does not exist, return None. :param key: the key to get :return: the value of the key, and a boolean indicating whether the key exists

len()[source]

Get the number of items in the cache. :return: the number of items in the cache

remove_lru()[source]

Remove the least recently used item from the cache. :return: None
